thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: John Gearhart MD FACS FRCS
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by John Gearhart MD FACS FRCS

author: John Gearhart MD FACS FRCS
title: John Gearhart MD FACS FRCS
text: Ray at Lux was friendly, helpful and truly dedicated to helping me get a good business class fare fairly close to when I needed to travel. He gave me several options with numerous first rate airlines in short order. very pleased with the service and responsiveness of the entire process.
